name: Moths to a Flame (DuckDuckGrem)
description:
You were having fun exploring a maze when the sun began setting. Now it's dark, and you've only got the light of your lantern to help you escape. But while it helps you find the exit, it also helps the creatures lurking in the dark find you. 

Created for "Pixel Game Jam - 2022" with the theme "adventure"! Created in GDevelop, with the exception of two Mixkit audio files used under their Free License, everything in the game is my own. 

Controls: 

Move your character with WASD or arrow keys. That's it. Enjoy!
